fields.name: Spiritual Instruction (2x, Charge 125%):
fields.value: Target a player. If they are not Town, you will attack them. If they are Town, you will increase their defense power by 0.2x.

fields.name: Prayer for Strength (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the bottom 3. Use in the evening. Your attack power tonight will be  doubled.

fields.name: Prayer for Wisdom (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Use during the evening. You will learn the identity and role of one random, non-Town player.

fields.name: Oath of Chastity (Passive):
fields.value: You are immune to roleblocks and immune to any negative effects potentially triggered by your messages during the day phase.
